main.name: Kala Elam
main.occupation: Full Stack Web Developer and Yoga Instructor,
main.description: with an eye for beauty and love for life
main.bio: Web developer with a certificate from SMU in full stack web technologies including JavaScript, CSS, React, and responsive web design. Bachelor's degree in communication science disorders from TCU. A passion for creativity and an eye for beauty from years of traveling the world, experiencing other cultures and technologies. Experience working with diverse teams in a variety of settings

skills.name: MERN Stack- MongoDB / Mongoose * Express * React * Node

yoga.yogamessage: I found yoga in 2006 and thought it would be the easiest blow off class but little did I know it would become my life-line to sanity. In 2012 I signed up for teacher training. After months of joy sweat pulled muscles and zen I received my RYT-200hr in 2013 from Indra’s Grace. My classes are like mystery meat you never know what you are getting and you don’t ask. My goal in teaching and in life is that everyone takes more time to laugh and be silly.
